Data:
From: [SENDER]
To: [RECEIVER]
Subject: MAS Provisioning Notification (contains an attachment)
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-type: Multipart/Mixed; boundary="NextPart"

--NextPart
Content-Type: text/plain

Please import the attached certificate into the browser to access MAS UI.

MAS provisioning status: [STATUS]
OpenShift Cluster URL: https://console-openshift-console.apps.[CLUSTER-NAME].[BASE-DOMAIN]
OpenShift API URL: https://api.[CLUSTER-NAME].[BASE-DOMAIN]:6443
OpenShift User: [OCP-USER]
OpenShift Password: [OCP-PASSWORD]
SLS URL: https://sls.ibm-sls.ibm-sls.apps.[CLUSTER-NAME].[BASE-DOMAIN]
BAS URL: https://dashboard-ibm-bas.apps.[CLUSTER-NAME].[BASE-DOMAIN]
BAS Credentials: Use OpenShift authentication
MAS Initial Setup URL: https://admin.mas-[RANDOM-STR].apps.[CLUSTER-NAME].[BASE-DOMAIN]/initialsetup
MAS Admin URL: https://admin.mas-[RANDOM-STR].apps.[CLUSTER-NAME].[BASE-DOMAIN]
MAS Workspace URL: https://[MAS-WORKSPACE].home.mas-[RANDOM-STR].apps.[CLUSTER-NAME].[BASE-DOMAIN]
MAS User: [MAS-USER]
MAS Password: [MAS-PASSWORD]
.

--NextPart
Content-Type: text/plain;
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="mas-ca.crt"
[CA-CERT]
